name: Car Dealer 3D
description:
Who doesn’t want to be rich, right? Well, now it’s your turn, in Car Dealer 3D!

It’s time to brush up on your sales tactics in the latest auto trading simulator. Buy, assess and sell a variety of used vehicles, trying to make a profit as you go. Rolling in cash? Time to upgrade your dealership, in order to become the next billionaire.

Don’t forget to keep that forecourt tidy! Move and park the cars after purchase, trying your best not to scratch up your latest asset before your next big sale.

With a variety of VIP customers waiting for you, it’s time to get into gear and get to work!

Car Dealer 3D Features:
-Become the best dealer in town
-Make cash
-Upgrade your dealership
-Become an auto trading tycoon!
